headline: Skyworks cut to Hold at Argus due to shrinking Apple business
summary: As previously reported, Argus downgraded Skyworks (SWKS) to Hold from Buy. Apple (AAPL) is by far Skyworks’s largest customer, at 69% of FY24 revenue, but it will now dual-source a premier RF socket in the new upcoming iPhone 17 generation family that Skyworks had formerly sole-sourced, and Skyworks has recently revealed that it would lose 20%-25% content in the iPhone 17 launch due to launch in fall 2025, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Argus adds that it would need to see signs
